name: Taglog Inc
address:
Address: Kyobashi MID Bldg., 13-10, Kyobashi 2-chome, Chuo-ku, Tokyo

Headquarter: Tokyo, Japan
Established: Jan, 2020
Board Member: Ryoma Okano, Kosuke Yoshida
philosophy_sentence: We are dedicated to balance employment and right human resources distribution throughout free to labor.
mission_sentence: To build happy relationship between employers and foreigners, contributing to create better working en- vironment in Japan.
business_sentence:
1. Recruitment for Japanese company to “Specified Skilled Worker”, “Technical Intern” and/or “Highly-Skilled Foreign Professionals” (hereinafter foreign worker)

2. Support for foreign worker of daily annoyance through telecommunications.

3. Support for foreign worker of exam preparation for residential status exten- sion.

4. Providing a meet up places both virtual and real for foreign workers. 5. Consult to client for hiring new employees
6. Support for client to expand business to overseas.
